features: Sharp Huusk Chef Knife: Our Huusk chef knives are constructed from premium japanese steel. It performs well in toughness and durability. Like traditional Japanese kitchen knives, Huusk blades have a precision cutting quality. Each blade is handcrafted to create a precise, long-lasting cut. The sharp Huusk blade makes the cooking safe and effortless. (Warm Tip: Always hand washes those forged in fire Huusk knives!)

Multi-function Huusk Chef Knife: Our Huusk Japan knife is multipurpose, whether you trim brisket, skin or break down a whole chicken, or even separate ribs from pork loin. A curved profile can be precisely separated meat and bone. It is very sharp, suitable for kitchen, outdoor camping or BBQ.

Stylish & Practical Viking Knife– Unique hammered texture on the blade makes it beautiful to behold and corrosion-resistant while it also helps to prevent foods from sticking. Curved wood handle and large finger hole on the blade provide a secure grip for excellent control while filleting fish, chopping vegetables, and deboning meat. The Full Tang design prevents this forged boning knife from falling easily.

Unique Leather Sheath and High-End Gift Box -- The Huusk Japanese kitchen knife is equipped with a portable soft leather sheath. It can protect the blade well and you can put on a belt for easy carrying when camping outdoor. The high-end gift box packaging is a good choice for you to give gifts to family and friends on the holiday.

HUUSK GUARANTEE: As a professional Huusk kitchen knife manufacturer, we focus on offering high-quality cool husk kitchen knives. We also provide a 100% SATISFACTION WARRANTY OR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE for any reason. No Risking Shopping! We aim to provide high-quality hand-forged Huusk chef knives and a pleasant shopping experience.
body.description: Warm Tips: 1.Please store the caveman knife in a safe place out of reach of children. 2. The forged boning knife' edge is sharp. Please be careful when using it. 3. Don’t cut plastic, wire or other materials. 4. Huusk knife is pre-oiled. Some people see the oil and regard it as a used item. THAT'S NOT TRUE. It's pre-oiled to protect the blade during shipping.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HUUSK KNIVES ARE ESSENTIAL GIFT FOR EVERY CHEF Tradition Craft Meets Modern Technology Each Huusk knife is carefully crafted using a 138-step design and sharpened manually by workers with more than 10 years of experience. Compared with kitchen knives made with mechanical ways, our knives have a longer service life.

HUUSK JAPANESE KITCHEN KNIFE Sharp Blande Edge The thick and sturdy blade is made of carbon steel. The steel is extremely hard and makes the blade really sharp. The 16° V-shaped blade edge minimizes cutting resistance, helps you cut food effortlessly neatly like chopping through butter. Ingenious Design The hammered texture on the blade not only makes it elegant and unique, but also anti-sticking. In addition, it also features a precision, laser-carved index finger hole for superior control. Excellent Grip The ergonomic curved handle, consist of high quality Oak Wood, provides a comfortable feel. The full tang structure handle, which is different from general welding handle, will not break after long-term use.

Warm Tips: 1.Please store the caveman knife in a safe place out of reach of children. 2. The forged boning knife' edge is sharp. Please be careful when using it. 3. Don’t cut plastic, wire or other materials. 4. Huusk knife is pre-oiled. Some people see the oil and regard it as a used item. THAT'S NOT TRUE. It's pre-oiled to protect the blade during shipping. Package Include: 1* Huusk Chef knife 1* Leather knife sheath 1* Exquisite packaging box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite go-to knive.
reviews.reviewText: Sharp as a razor. Chops, slices and cuts with ease due to the weight of the knife and blade. Can get a really good grip and control the blade well. The downside is that it is a high carbon blade for keeping a sharp edge and NOT stainless steel. The knife cannot go in the dishwasher and has to be washed by hand and dried thoroughly to prevent rusting later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sharp, watch out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really cool looking. Better for outdoor camping use. Not sharp out of the box except for the amazingly sharp point. Knife is too thick for most food prep jobs. Any firm product like cheese or steak will get spread and hang up your downward pressure before being cut (maybe not a problem if the knife were sharper) the hole in the blade is really nice and would make you much more confident in a battle in the woods. I haven't had discoloration problems like others report. Should probably be dried and oiled after use. For the money, very happy. It's cool looking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Have not used much yet. Arrived very sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked mine so well, I bought one for my dad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as sharp as said
reviews.reviewText: When reviewing this knife it said that it was razor sharp. The second time using it barely cut a tomato. Like the grip, weight and finger slot. Just would have enjoyed if it was as sharp as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent knife for cutting up whole chickens
reviews.reviewText: This is a good knife for cutting most things but excels in cutting up chicken. I was a meat cutter back in the 1970's and using an old fashion butcher cleaver, I could cut up 60 lbs of chicken in around 5-6 minutes. The old cleavers are hard to find now but this knife has a strong tang and back which is suited for cutting thru bones and joints. Also works well for chopping vegetables for soup. Made in Japan and easy to sharpen. If you work in the kitchen, this is a great knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Knife not what advertised
reviews.reviewText: After watching the video of all the wonderful things this knife could do, I was excited to order one. Upon receipt of the knife, I tried to cut a tomato and the knife was so dull it would not even pierce the tomato skin. I took the knife to a piece of paper and again, it would not even cut thru paper the way the video said it would. Truly disappointing- sending this knife back to get my money back.

reviews.reviewerName: Great product Exceeded my expectations totally
reviews.reviewTitle: Thick blade good for outdoors not a kitchen knife
reviews.reviewText: It’s a ok knifeMore of a outdoors knife than kitchen knife
Not bad for simple job.Not recommended.

quality and finish looks good ,it fell way short on sharpness to what is claimed , had to use sawing action on chicken and would not cut a tomato , a little upset as it does not live up to the hype , did not try cutting butter

reviews.reviewTitle: Couteau non aiguisé Ne coupe absolument pas Très déçu
reviews.reviewText: Couteau non aiguisé Ne coupe absolument
Le couteau est beau et travaille plutôt bien mais l’affaitage laisse à désirer
